General Game Control: To help you create and maintain highscores for your games, GameMaker Studio 2 creates a global high score array of 10 places which you can access, add to, and change to create your own custom high score lists without too much fuss. This functionality is local to the game and works on all platforms, so you can easily store and maintain a basic high score table using these functions along with the File Handling Functions.
